MS MCQs

    Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines - Choose a tool for scanning open-source dependencies

    »

    1. How can you make sure an open-source component you use doesn’t have security defects?

      Examine the component’s documentation to understand known vulnerabilities.

      Regularly scan open-source components that you use for known vulnerabilities.

      Use open-source code only from reputable authors.


    2. Why is it important to assess the license that’s associated with every open-source component you use?

      Some licenses have provisions that might not be acceptable to your company’s use of open source.

      It helps you choose a license for your own open source projects.

      It’s not important. Open source refers to free, unrestricted use of the software.
